#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

int main()
{
    int n,k,i,j,x;
    ll sum, *a, *b;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(x=1;x<=n;x++)
    {
        sum=0;
        scanf("%d",&k);
        a=new ll [k];
        b=new ll [k];
        for(i=0;i<k;i++)
            scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
        for(i=0;i<k;i++)
            scanf("%lld",&b[i]);
        sort(a,a+k);
        sort(b,b+k);
        for(i=0;i<k;i++)
        {
            sum+=abs(a[i]-b[i]);
        }
        printf("Case %d: %lld\n",x,sum);
        delete []a;
        delete []b;
    }
        return 0;
}
